title: My League keeps crashing
body: My league of legends has keeps crashing once we enter summoners rift. I have dual monitors it turns off the one with the graphics card and restarts my computer leaving only the monitor using the internal card on and then I have to log back in but my game is much more laggy then before and every time it risks getting remade which has gotten me my second set of five 20 minute waits. Please help I've tried to reinstall league and everything.

replies.body: I'd like to help but it's hard to diagnose what's happening with the information provided.  To help, can you provide more details on what you mean by crashing?  Do you get any error messages and what does it say?  When exactly does this occur?  Let me know!

I get no error message all that happens is both my screens turn black and i have to sign into my computer again but only one screen will work. And league only registers it as me leaving the game. It happens when Summoner's Rift loads up and I'm in game already. This is also the only game I know it happens with
